products.title: Gildan 5000 Heavy Cotton Tee - S-2XL only
products.short_description: Gildan 5000 Heavy Cotton Classic Fit Adult T-shirt - budget friendly, good quality standard t-shirt in a medium/heavy weight 100% cotton fabric. Offered at a competitive price, if you are looking for a good value basic tee, this is it.
products.description:
100% 180GSM Cotton

Preshrunk jersey knit

Seemless double needle 2.22cm collar

Taped neck and shoulders

Double needle sleeve and bottom hems

Quarter turned to eliminate centre crease
products.size:
Size S M L XL XXL XXXL
 Measure A (cm)  46  51  56  61  66  -
 Measure B (cm)  71  74  76  79  81  -
